projectsDesc: Here are some of my recent projects. Some are solo projects, some are group projects. There are a variety of things here: web apps, visualizations, cms-powered sites, videos, twitter bots, diy projects, and an annual food festival.

projects.title: DIY Car Decal
projects.shortDescription: A vinyl car decal made for The Humane League's San Francisco office. Entry in Instructables laser contest.

projects.title: Cute Pets Denver
projects.shortDescription: Twitter bot that shares pictures & info about adoptable animals from the shelter in Denver. Scrapes data from gov webpage, posts to twitter. Follow the twitter bot | GovTech article

projects.title: Mobile Prototyping Board
projects.shortDescription: Whiteboard for low-fi prototyping of mobile app ideas. Designed in Illustrator, made with cnc vinyl cutter.

projects.title: Worcester VegFest
projects.shortDescription: Annual vegetarian festival in Worcester, MA. 7,000 attendees, 120 exhibitors, 200 volunteers.

projects.title: Countdown to 2014 Code for America Summit
projects.shortDescription: Webpage countdown to the 2014 Code for America Summit. Tools used: github.io pages, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap.

projects.title: Mobile Orchestra
projects.shortDescription: A mobile webapp that generates music based on data from participants during a Critical Mass bike riders. Made by a team of 5 of us.

projects.title: TryVeg.com
projects.shortDescription: Campaign website advocating vegetarianism. Tools used: Bootstrap, PHP, Wordpress, JavaScript, jQuery.

projects.title: SizeOf
projects.shortDescription: Webapp that checks the number of attendees for a given facebook event.

projects.title: COK.net
projects.shortDescription: Compassion Over Killing is a national organization focused on exposing and campaigning against animal cruelty on factory farms. Received over 1 million hits since launch.

projects.title: le Stands
projects.shortDescription: Web app for helping actvists track literature distribution through free newspaper stands. Tools used: CodeIgniter, PHP, MySQL, Bootstrap, ChartJS.

projects.title: SoyWallets
projects.shortDescription: a DIY wallet made from a used soymilk container. featured on the MAKE blog

projects.title: Key Rack
projects.shortDescription: a homemade key rack made from keys. Featured on frontpage of reddit and on the MAKE Zine website.

projects.title: Juggalos that wear Abercrombie & Fitch
projects.shortDescription: a video mashup of LFO's song "Summer Girls" played to video from ICP's song "Juggalo Island"

projects.title: Code for America Tabletop Display
projects.shortDescription: Reproducible DIY tabletop display for Code for America brigades. Made with a ShopBot CNC router.

projects.title: Traffic Accidents in Denver
projects.shortDescription: Map of traffic accidents in Denver based on open data from the city. Tools used: Leaflet.js, Mapbox.js, Omnivore

projects.title: Abandoned Trolley Tracks in Denver
projects.shortDescription: Map of abandoned trolley tracks in Denver based on open data from the city. Tools used: Leaflet.js, Mapbox.js, Omnivore
